column4: in my apache2-default folder, located in /var/www/. there is alot of index files in different languages. and some gif files, how do I remove them?
So I can put my own in there :)
dpgk -S <filename> to find out to which packge the files you want removed belong, and then apt-get remove that package
unless you want to just break the package, and remove files by hand
